name: I Am Curious (Yellow)
summary_text: Told in a quasi-documentary style, this companion piece to I Am Curious (Blue) (1968) deals with topics such as class society, non-violent resistance, sex, relationships, and tourism to Francoist Spain.

name: The Devil, Probably
summary_text: Charles drifts through politics, religion and psychoanalysis, rejecting them all. Once he realises the depth of his disgust with the moral and physical decline of the society he lives in, ...                See full summary »

name: Diana: In Her Own Words
summary_text: This documentary uses the recordings Princess Diana made for the book that was written by Andrew Morton. In this documentary Diana narrates her life and the events that surrounded her.

name: Stonewall
summary_text: A young man's political awakening and coming of age during the days and weeks leading up to the Stonewall Riots.

name: Wasteland
summary_text: A young man recently released from prison recruits his three best friends to rob the local drug kingpin who is responsible for his incarceration. Can he get revenge and win back his fed-up girlfriend?

name: London River
summary_text: Two strangers come to discover the fate of their respective children in the 2005 terrorist attacks on London.

name: The Quiller Memorandum
summary_text: In the West Berlin of the 1960s, two British agents are killed by a Nazi group, prompting British Intelligence to dispatch agent Quiller to investigate.

name: Kissed
summary_text: Over the years, a child's romantic ideals about death blossom into necrophilia, the study of embalming and the most profound relationship of her life.

name: Roger Corman's Frankenstein Unbound
summary_text: The ultimate weapon, which was meant to be safe for humankind, produces global side-effects, including time slides and disappearances. The scientist behind the project and his car are ...                See full summary »

name: The Barbarians
summary_text: Two twin barbarians seek revenge from the warlord who massacred their tribe and captured them when they were small children.

name: La cabina
summary_text: A man gets trapped inside a telephone box and nobody is able to free him.

name: Amnesiac
summary_text: A misery-esque tale of a man who wakes up in bed after an accident, suffering from memory loss. He begins to suspect that his wife isn't really his real wife and soon finds himself a prisoner in the house.

name: Deal of the Century
summary_text: A small time arms dealer in South America to sell weapons to the revolutionaries, winds up negotiating the sale of an experimental plane to the nation's dictator.

name: The Transfiguration
summary_text: When troubled teen Milo, who has a fascination with vampire lore, meets the equally alienated Sophie, the two form a bond that begins to blur Milo's fantasy into reality.

name: What to Do in Case of Fire
summary_text: 6 anarchists place a time bomb in a West Berlin building in 1987. It's a dud. It blows up in 2000. Only 2 remain anarchists. How can the 6 steal evidence from a police "fortress" and avoid 8 years prison?

name: A Muppet Family Christmas
summary_text: Kermit and his friends spend Christmas staging a surprise visit to Fozzie Bear's mother's farm.

name: Apoorva Sagodharargal
summary_text: Appu and Raja are twins who were separated at birth, grow up in different localities. Appu's quest for revenge begins upon learning that his father was killed by four criminals.

name: Elvis
summary_text: Biographical movie about the famous rock singer Elvis Presley.

name: Wanda
summary_text: Wanda, a lonely housewife, drifts through mining country until she meets a petty thief who takes her in.

name: Lake Dead
summary_text: Three sisters and a group of their friends take a trip to the home of the recently deceased grandfather -- who died a particularly grisly death -- to learn more about the promise of an inheritance, only to encounter a family of psychos who have taken up residence in the old man's cabin.

name: Jigoku
summary_text: A group of sinners involved in interconnected tales of murder, revenge, deceit and adultery all meet at the Gates of Hell.

name: The Evil That Men Do
summary_text: A professional killer comes out of retirement to investigate and avenge the brutal murder of an old friend.

name: Themis
summary_text: After two teenagers from abusive households befriend each other, their lives take a dark adventure into existentialism, despair, and human frailty.

name: The Travelling Players
summary_text: Greece, 1939-1952: Fascist, Nazi, and Communist conflict, as seen through the eyes of a family of travelling provincial players.

name: The Legacy of a Whitetail Deer Hunter
summary_text: The great hunter Buck Ferguson (Josh Brolin) and his trusted cameraman Don (Danny McBride) set out for an epic weekend adventure to reconnect with Buck's young son (Montana Jordan).

name: The Hard Word
summary_text: 3 brothers are in and out of prison in connection with heists planned by their lawyer et al. He gets them out for the heists and "looks after" the money and one's wife.

name: Sniper: Ultimate Kill
summary_text: For the first time, Brandon Beckett, Richard Miller and Sgt. Thomas Beckett join forces in Colombia to take down a brutal drug cartel.

name: The Bitter Tea of General Yen
summary_text: A Chinese warlord and an engaged Christian missionary fall in love.

name: Vanguard
summary_text: Covert security company Vanguard is the last hope of survival for an accountant after he is targeted by the world's deadliest mercenary organization.

name: Gori Tere Pyaar Mein!
summary_text: Self-centered Sriram Venkat changes his outlook and actions when his girlfriend leaves him.

name: Benvenuti al nord
summary_text: Now back in Milan, Alberto has accepted to manage a program for efficiency improvement in the Italian Post. He devotes all his time and energy to this noble task and neglects his wife ...                See full summary »

name: Mr. Vampire
summary_text: The planned reburial of a town elder goes awry as the corpse resurrects into a hopping, bloodthirsty vampire, targeting everyone responsible for digging the grave. A Taoist Priest and his two disciples attempt to stop the terror.

name: Nayak: The Hero
summary_text: En route to Delhi to receive an award, a Bengali film star reevaluates his success through his fellow passengers, dreams and past experiences.

name: Just Another Christmas
summary_text: Stuck in a time loop where it's forever Christmas, a family man who hates the holiday starts to learn valuable lessons about what's important in life.

name: Road Kill
summary_text: A supernatural thriller about a group of teenagers menaced by a driver-less train in the Australian outback.

name: The Last Movie Star
summary_text: An aging former movie star is forced to face the reality that his glory days are behind him. On its surface, the film is a tale about faded fame. At its core, it's a universal story about growing old.

name: L'assaut
summary_text: Based on a true story, a SWAT team is tasked with storming a hijacked Air France plane to save its passengers.

name: Insaat
summary_text: The series of extreme events happens to two construction workers when one of them discovers something bad about their boss.

name: Pasolini
summary_text: A kaleidoscopic look at the last day of Italian filmmaker Pier Paolo Pasolini in 1975.

name: Dead or Alive 2: Birds
summary_text: Two contract killers cross paths in the middle of the same job and realize they are childhood friends.

name: What?
summary_text: During her Italian vacation, a young and beautiful American tourist finds herself as a guest in a coastal villa inhabited by a bunch of odd people.

name: Silk Stockings
summary_text: A musical remake of Ninotchka: After three bumbling Soviet agents fail in their mission to retrieve a straying Soviet composer from Paris, the beautiful, ultra-serious Ninotchka is sent to ...                See full summary »

name: The Great McGinty
summary_text: Dan McGinty has great success in his chosen field of crooked politics, but he endangers it all in one crazy moment of honesty.

name: The Line
summary_text: The unstable new kingpin of a Tijuana drug cartel is targeted by an assassin for elimination.

name: Thirty Two Short Films About Glenn Gould
summary_text: A collection of vignettes highlighting different aspects of the life, work, and character of the acclaimed Canadian classical pianist.

name: Flying Tigers
summary_text: Capt. Jim Gordon's command of the famed American mercenary fighter group in China is complicated by the recruitment of an old friend who is a reckless hotshot.

name: Welcome to New York
summary_text: Mr. Devereaux is a powerful man. A man who handles billions of dollars every day. A man who controls the economic fate of nations. A man driven by a frenzied and unbridled sexual hunger. A ...                See full summary »

name: The Fall of the House of Usher
summary_text: Allan visits the sinister Usher family mansion, where his friend Roderick is painting a portrait of his sickly wife Madeline. The portrait seems to be draining the life out of Madeline, slowly leading to her death.

name: Bitter Harvest
summary_text: Set in 1930s Ukraine, as Stalin advances the ambitions of communists in the Kremlin, young artist Yuri battles to save his lover Natalka from the Holodomor, the death-by-starvation program that ultimately killed millions of Ukrainians.

name: Eftihia
summary_text: A biographical film about the life of the greatest songwriter in Greece , Eftyhia Papagianopoulou (1893-1972)

name: Vettaikaaran
summary_text: Ravi, a student aspiring to become a police officer, becomes the target of a politician. He turns vigilante with the identity of "Police Ravi" to secure justice.

name: Land of the Blind
summary_text: A soldier recounts his relationship with a famous political prisoner attempting to overthrow their country's authoritarian government.

name: Europe '51
summary_text: A wealthy woman becomes obsessed with humanitarianism when her young son dies after committing suicide.

name: Dangerous Game
summary_text: A New York City film director working on his latest movie in Los Angeles begins to reflect the actions in his movie and real life, especially when he begins an affair with the lead actress.

name: Hidden Kisses
summary_text: Nathan goes to a high school party and meets Louis. The two find themselves out of sight and kissing, but someone takes a photo of them. When the photo is placed online, a storm overtakes their lives.

name: Girlfriend's Day
summary_text: A now down-on-his-luck romance card writer, Ray Wentworth, decides to recapture the feelings that once made him the greatest with the creation of a new holiday: Girlfriend's Day.

name: Kruistocht in spijkerbroek
summary_text: After using his mother's newly built time machine, Dolf gets stuck in the year 1212. He ends up in a children's crusade where he confronts his new friends with modern techniques. However, ...                See full summary »

name: Phoenix
summary_text: A cop (Liotta) with a gambling addiction plots a theft from the bookies who are putting pressure on him to pay off or else.

name: Feel the Noise
summary_text: A young man from the South Bronx dreams of making it as a rapper, until a run-in with local thugs forces him to hide in Puerto Rico with the father he never knew.

name: Motherland Hotel
summary_text: The lonely proprietor of a small hotel in a provincial Turkish town develops a passion for a departed guest and the reality of routine everyday-life starts crumbling into pieces.

name: Mario
summary_text: Two young football players get caught up between the politics of the game and the politics of love.

name: My iz budushchego
summary_text: Four present-day Russian men dig for Nazi memorabilia at a WWII battlefield. A wormhole lake sends them back to a battle in 1942 USSR.

name: 30 Nights of Paranormal Activity with the Devil Inside the Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
summary_text: After a stint in a psychiatric hospital, a young woman returns to the house where her father killed the entire cast of The Artist during his exorcism.

name: The Brain
summary_text: When NATO transfers some of its funds from Paris to Brussels by train, a criminal mastermind posing as a British colonel plans to steal it but two petty French thieves also have the same intent.

name: Hercules
summary_text: The story of the Greek mythological figure, updated in this 80's version.

name: Dragon Lord
summary_text: The adventures of a restless martial arts student called Dragon, who, while constantly pursuing a girl, gets involved in the affairs of a gang of thieves.

name: Phillauri
summary_text: A man must marry a tree to ward off threats to his love-life, but the tree turns out to have more spirit than the man bargained for.

name: A Wolf at the Door
summary_text: A journey to the dark cutting edge of desires, lies and wickedness of a love triangle, from the moment a child is mysteriously kidnapped.

name: Road to Singapore
summary_text: Two playboys try to forget previous romances in Singapore - until they meet a beautiful dancer.

name: Wolf
summary_text: A promising kickboxer struggles to resist the temptations of a life of crime.

name: Gross Anatomy
summary_text: A fisherman's son goes through medical school with a bad attitude, especially in cadaver class.

Two friends living in a small town during the 1960s, run away to enjoy their freedom during the Vietnam War, thus disappointing the father of one of them. When they return to town, they realize the importance of family unity.

name: Beat Street
summary_text: An aspiring DJ, from the South Bronx, and his best friend, a promoter, try to get into show business by exposing people to hip-hop music and culture.

name: The Rainmaker
summary_text: During the Depression, a con-man promises rain to a desperate drought-ridden Kansas town and marriage to a local desperate spinster.

name: Diaz - Don't Clean Up This Blood
summary_text: A reenactment of the final days of the 2001 G8 Summit.

name: Yamadonga
summary_text: A lovable scoundrel's life is cut short when he angers the god of death; however, he still has a few tricks up his sleeve.

name: Faust
summary_text: An ordinary man is lured into a strange puppet theatre by a map and finds himself embroiled in a production of the Faustian legend.

name: May the Devil Take You
summary_text: When her estranged father falls into a mysterious coma, a young woman seeks answers at his old villa, where she and her stepsister uncover dark truths.

name: Hijacked
summary_text: A special agent's plans to reconcile with his ex-fiancé are ruined when she boards a private jet that is targeted by hijackers working for the same crime lord that he is chasing.

name: Hukkle
summary_text: Using almost no dialogue, the film follows a number of residents (both human and animal) of a small rural community in Hungary - an old man with hiccups, a shepherdess and her sheep, an old...                See full summary »

name: Garip
summary_text: The story is about a man's sad life who lives his daughter. They manages so many problem but never leaves each others.

name: A Real Young Girl
summary_text: Reluctantly, a sulky adolescent returns to her parents' house for yet another boring summer vacation, dabbling in desire and the art of desirability, eventually mixing reality with vision, caged fantasies with the fierce female sexuality.

name: Ares
summary_text: In a future France with many unemployed, big companies run the country. Ares is a loser boxer. When his sister's arrested, he agrees to a new drug, that'll help him win.

name: Tholi Prema
summary_text: While Balu falls in love with Anu at first sight, she is unaware of his emotions. The difficulties that he needs to face to win her heart, form the rest of the story.

name: The Horror Show
summary_text: Detective McCarthy finally catches "Meat Cleaver Max", a serial killer, who promises revenge during his execution. Nonetheless, a parapsychologist tells the detective that the only hope of stopping Max for good is to destroy his spirit.

name: Rita, Sue and Bob Too
summary_text: Realistic story of working class Yorkshire life. Two schoolgirls have a sexual fling with a married man. Serious and light-hearted by turns.

name: Western
summary_text: German construction workers building a dam near a Bulgarian village interact with the locals, and soon the troubles arise both with the locals and among themselves.

name: A Bride for Christmas
summary_text: A single man tries to win a bet by getting a woman recovering from a broken engagement to marry him by Christmas.

name: Christmas Cupid
summary_text: Los Angeles publicist is forced to reconsider her life choices as she gets visited by ghosts of her ex-boyfriends in the eve of Christmas.

name: The Incident
summary_text: Late one night, two young toughs hold hostage the passengers in one car of a New York subway train.

name: The Color of Friendship
summary_text: A white South African girl finds herself in a difficult situation when she is sent to spend a term with a black family in America.

name: To hok wai lung
summary_text: A SWAT team leader is going undercover at a high school to retrieve a stolen gun for his captain.

name: Crypto
summary_text: Demoted back to his hometown, a young Wall Street banker is drawn into investigating a tangled web of corruption and fraud in Upstate New York, affecting both his personal life and business career.

name: Ghost in the Shell: The New Movie
summary_text: Newport-City 2029: Major, an advanced female cyborg, is in charge of the anti-terrorism etc. unit reporting directly to the government. Taking out terrorists and freeing hostages at an embassy doesn't go smoothly. Major investigates why.

name: Lake Bodom
summary_text: Every camper's worst nightmare came true at Lake Bodom in 1960 when four teenagers were stabbed to death while sleeping in their tent.

name: My Wife Is an Actress
summary_text: A "normal" guy who is married to a hot actress gets worried that she is involved with her costar. This worry turns into jealousy and causes problems in their relationship. This is a story about trust and a comedy about the actions between men and women.

name: The Big City
summary_text: Life at home changes when a house-wife from a middle-class, conservative family in Calcutta gets a job as a saleswoman.

name: Swimming with Men
summary_text: A man who is suffering a mid-life crisis finds new meaning in his life as part of an all-male, middle-aged, amateur synchronised swimming team.

name: Wizard School
summary_text: Sihirbazlik Okulunda Bir Türk

name: Gunless
summary_text: A hardened American gunslinger is repeatedly thwarted in his attempts to mount a showdown in a friendly town in Canada where no one seems to understand or appreciate the brutal code of the American Wild West.

name: Soultaker
summary_text: Four teenagers are killed in a car accident. Two of the teenagers refuse to go with "The Grim Reaper" and a race between life and death ensues!

name: Mubarakan
summary_text: Singleton Kartar Singh is left with the responsibility of raising his 2 orphaned nephews. He asks his brother to raise Charan and his sister in London to raise Karan. When the twins cross continents, they leave behind a trail of confusion.

name: Chasing the Dragon
summary_text: An illegal immigrant from Mainland China sneaks into corrupt British-colonized Hong Kong in 1963, transforming himself into a ruthless and emerging drug lord.

name: Big Man Japan
summary_text: An eccentric man living alone in a decrepit house in Tokyo periodically transforms into a 100-foot tall giant in order to defend Japan against similarly sized monsters.

name: Unconditional Love
summary_text: After her husband unexpectedly leaves her, Grace Beasley (Kathy Bates) spontaneously travels to Great Britain to attend the funeral of Victor Fox (Jonathan Pryce), a singer she adored. ...                See full summary »

name: Look Back in Anger
summary_text: A disillusioned, angry university graduate comes to terms with his grudge against middle-class life and values.

name: El faro de las orcas
summary_text: A mother with an autistic child travel from Spain to Argentina looking to help her son to connect with his emotions.

name: Touchy Feely
summary_text: A massage therapist is unable to do her job when stricken with a mysterious and sudden aversion to bodily contact. Meanwhile, her uptight brother's floundering dental practice receives new life when clients seek out his healing touch.

name: Schlussmacher
summary_text: An employee at a professional separation agency, a business that helps couples break up, Paul tries to tackle the problems that come with Toto, the boyfriend of a customer, while he has his own thinking to do about love and relationships.

name: Puhdistus
summary_text: A tormented young woman is given a hiding place by an elderly lady and soon they are reminded of their mutual horrendous past.

name: Fudoh: The New Generation
summary_text: In order to settle a business dispute, a mob leader murders one of his own teenage sons. The surviving son vows to avenge his brother's death, and organizes his own gang of teenage killers to destroy his father's organization.

name: Ödipussi
summary_text: Gray-haired furniture retailer Paul Winkelmann still has his dinner cooked and his laundry done by his mother. He spends his evenings playing Scrabble with Mama's friends and discussing the...                See full summary »

name: Bedlam
summary_text: Nell Bowen, the protégé of Lord Mortimer, wants to help change the conditions of notorious St. Mary's of Bethlehem Asylum (Bedlam). Though she tries to reform Bedlam, but the cruel Master ...                See full summary »

name: Trevor Noah: Son of Patricia
summary_text: Noah's South African roots and upbringing merge into his recent American experience making for funny and human juxtapositions and observations.

name: Vendetta
summary_text: Special ops interrogation officer Jimmy Vickers tracks down a gang who slaughtered his parents. With police closing in & his old unit on his trail, he has to to evade capture long enough to complete his gruesome crusade.

name: La posesión de Emma Evans
summary_text: A family allows their young daughter's exorcism to be recorded secretly.

name: Tri palme za dve bitange i ribicu
summary_text: 1993 Serbia is a place torn by hyperinflation and economic disaster. Milan, an avid fan of FC Partizan, lives with his painter friend and makes money by selling his paintings to the "new ...                See full summary »

name: Wild Seven
summary_text: In this darkly karmic vision of Arizona, a man who breathes nothing but ill will begins a noxious domino effect as quickly as an uncontrollable virus kills.

summary_text: The BBC gives over a whole evening to an 'investigation into the supernatural'. Four respected presenters and a camera crew attempt to discover the truth behind 'The most haunted house in ...                See full summary »

name: A Dog's Breakfast
summary_text: A dysfunctional man living a secluded life believes that he has accidentally killed his sister's TV star fiancé.

name: Amy Schumer: Growing
summary_text: Amy Schumer's live stand-up set performed in Chicago where she jokes about marriage, pregnancy and personal growth.

name: Bushi no ichibun
summary_text: A look at the relationship between a young blind samurai (Kimura) and his wife, who will make a sacrifice in order to defend her husband's honor.

name: Favolacce
summary_text: A few families living out on a limb in the suburbs of Rome. Tensions here can explode at any time; ultimately it's the children who bring about the collapse.

name: The Giant Gila Monster
summary_text: A giant lizard terrorizes a rural Texas community and a heroic teenager attempts to destroy the creature.

name: Nicotina
summary_text: A real-time dark comedy about a science geek who tangles with a clutch of Russian gangsters after he delivers them the wrong computer disk.

name: State of the Union
summary_text: An industrialist is urged to run for President, but this requires uncomfortable compromises on both political and marital levels.

name: Rocko's Modern Life: Static Cling
summary_text: After being in space for 20 years, Rocko and his friends attempt to adjust to an even more modern life in the 21st century. However, when he learns that his favorite 90s cartoon isn't on the air anymore, Rocko tries locating its creator.

name: Bad Kids Go to Hell
summary_text: On a stormy Saturday afternoon, six students from Crestview Academy begin to meet horrible fates as they serve out their detentions. Is a fellow student to blame, or perhaps Crestview's alleged ghosts are behind the terrible acts?

name: Down Terrace
summary_text: A crime family looks to unmask the police informant in their midst who threatens to take down their business.

name: Ask Filmlerinin Unutulmaz Yönetmeni
summary_text: Hasmet, director of love stories, wants to make a film with a "social content". He makes a deal with the producer Abdulkadir, yet the actress Mujde Ar doesn't accept the leading role, as ...                See full summary »

name: Beautiful Creatures
summary_text: Two girls thrown together by their boyfriends' violence accidentally kill one of them.

name: Puppet Master: The Littlest Reich
summary_text: All hell breaks loose when a strange force animates the puppets up for auction at a convention, setting them on a bloody killing spree that's motivated by an evil as old as time.

name: Jönssonligan får guldfeber
summary_text: Sickan has a new plan. This time, the gang are going to steal a small computer micro chip which contains a top secret plan of what the government intends to do with Sweden in the future. ...                See full summary »

name: The Flame and the Arrow
summary_text: Dardo, a Robin Hood-like figure, and his loyal followers use a Roman ruin in Medieval Lombardy as their headquarters as they conduct an insurgency against their Hessian conquerors.

name: Skammerens datter
summary_text: Medieval Dunark's ruling family is murdered and the heir found with a bloody dagger. As the witch Shamer can't shame the heir to admit, the Shamer's daughter is fetched, as she, too, can make people see their shameful acts.

name: Whore
summary_text: A night in the life of a cynical prostitute forms the basis of Ken Russell's portrait of the world's oldest profession.

name: Africa Screams
summary_text: Two booksellers search for diamonds in Africa, along the way meeting a visually-impaired gunner, a hungry lion, and a tribe of cannibals.

name: The Ages of Lulu
summary_text: The story of a young woman's descent into the kinky and dangerous sexual underground in Madrid.

name: Mammuth
summary_text: A retiree battles to obtain his rightfully due pension.

name: Catchfire
summary_text: A witness to a mob assassination flees for her life from town to town, switching identities, but cannot seem to elude Milo, the chief killer out to get her.

name: Hans Christian Andersen
summary_text: The opening scene of the movie describes it best: "Once upon a time there lived in Denmark a great storyteller named Hans Christian Andersen. This is not the story of his life, but a fairy tale about the great spinner of fairy tales."

name: Noll tolerans
summary_text: Johan is a two-fisted Gothenburg cop who finds himself in a shoot-out with jewel robbers. After the smoke has cleared, one robber, shot by his accomplice, and an innocent bystander, are ...                See full summary »

name: The Hole
summary_text: While never-ending rain and a strange disease spread by cockroaches ravage Taiwan, a plumber makes a hole between two apartments and the inhabitants of each form a unique connection, enacted in musical numbers.

name: The Men Who Tread on the Tiger's Tail
summary_text: A Japanese general and his men disguise themselves as monks in order to pass an enemy border patrol.

name: Kill Chain
summary_text: Three strangers' lives are inevitably entangled in a conflict none of them are prepared for.

name: Held Up
summary_text: What should have been a romantic getaway turns into one hilarious debacle after another when Michael's woman dumps him in the desert where he gets carjacked by a teenager and he is taken hostage in a stickup at the local Sip and Zip.

name: Graduation Day
summary_text: A masked killer begins murdering students on the school track team after a track runner dies upon completion of a 30 second 200-meter race.

name: Personal Velocity
summary_text: Three women's escapes from their afflicted lives. Each struggles to flee from the men who confine their personal freedom.

name: Kleines Arschloch
summary_text: He is a small, short-sighted boy who politically incorrectly terrorizes his environment in an old-fashioned, disrespectful and sometimes vulgar manner.

name: A Stranger Among Us
summary_text: Emily, a tough NYPD cop, is sent to an orthodox Jewish community to investigate a missing person plus $720,000 in missing diamonds. To solve what becomes a murder case, she has to join the community.

name: Return to the 36th Chamber
summary_text: When thugs prey upon innocent factory workers, a small-time scammer trains for revenge by studying the moves of Shaolin temple monks.

name: Madeline's Madeline
summary_text: A theatre director's latest project takes on a life of its own when her young star takes her performance too seriously.

name: Capture the Flag
summary_text: A young surfer rallies his friends to stop a billionaire from rewriting history as a way to hoard Helium 3, the clean energy of the future.

name: Can't Complain
summary_text: Triplets Prince - Bebo - Semsem (Ahmed Helmy) are taking advantage of similarities between them and outwitted the people, till meet a psychiatrist crook Suleiman al-Halabi.

name: Going the Distance
summary_text: In order to prevent a recent high school graduate from getting engaged, two friends intervene by taking him on a cross-country road trip.

name: The Toolbox Murders
summary_text: A ski-masked maniac kills apartment complex tenants with the contents of a toolbox.

name: Bodyguard
summary_text: A government bodyguard protects a politician from a suicide bomber, and then begins to question his dedication to his job.

name: Mojin: The Lost Legend
summary_text: In 1969 PRChina, two men survive a supernatural tomb. They later become tomb raiders with Shirley/Qi Shu. 20 years later in NYC, one is hired to find that tomb again and the 2 friends follow later.

name: Modern Romance
summary_text: Albert Brooks directs himself as a successful film editor with far too many issues that affects the relationship between him and his remarkably patient girlfriend.

name: Kozure Ôkami: Jigoku e ikuzo! Daigorô
summary_text: In the sixth and final film of the Lone Wolf and Cub series, the final conflict between Ogami Itto and the Yagyu clan is carried out.

name: Ye habe ghand
summary_text: The story happens in an old house in an old city of Iran. Because of the wedding of the youngest sister, Pasandide, all of her sisters come to their old house to help their mother.

name: Daddy Long Legs
summary_text: A wealthy American has a chance encounter with a joyful young French woman, and anonymously pays for her education. She writes letters to her mysterious benefactor, nicknaming him from the description given by some of her fellow orphans.

name: Little Sister
summary_text: Young nun Colleen is avoiding all contact from her family, returning to her childhood home in Asheville NC, she finds her old room exactly how she left it: painted black and covered in goth/metal posters.

name: Daria in 'Is It College Yet?'
summary_text: Daria, Jane, and the rest of the Lawndale High seniors face graduation and college in this series finale TV-movie from MTV's "Daria."

name: Double Whammy
summary_text: A world-weary police detective who fails to stop a fast-food restaurant massacre struggles to regain his departmental reputation, public image and self-worth.

name: Valdez Is Coming
summary_text: A Mexican-American sheriff must resort to violence against a powerful rancher in order to get just compensation for the pregnant Indian widow of a wrongly killed black man.

name: Kyûketsu Shôjo tai Shôjo Furanken
summary_text: Transfer student Monami has a secret and a past that has caught up with Mizushima. Deceiving Mizushima into eating a token gift of chocolate, laced with her blood, he is then catapulted ...                See full summary »

name: Cachorro
summary_text: Pedro, a gay man with an active social life and many friends, takes in his nephew Bernardo for a couple weeks. When the arrangement becomes permanent , Pedro turns to his friends for guidance as he and Bernardo forge a household together.

name: A Force of One
summary_text: When the detectives of an undercover police unit are being mysteriously killed by a martial artist, a professional kickboxer is hired to assist them.

name: Morituri
summary_text: A war pacifist is blackmailed to pose as an SS officer and to disable the scuttling explosives on freighter carrying rubber cargo to be captured by the Allies.

name: Voyagers
summary_text: A crew of astronauts on a multi-generational mission descend into paranoia and madness, not knowing what is real or not.

name: Jubal
summary_text: A new foreman rejects the sexual advances of a frustrated rancher's wife, which leads to conflicts that could get him killed.

name: Some Girl(s)
summary_text: On the eve of his wedding, a successful writer travels across the country to meet up with ex-lovers in an attempt to make amends for past relationship transgressions.

name: Alone in the Wilderness
summary_text: In 1968, one man films his attempt to build a cabin and live in the Alaskan wilderness. He goes weeks or months at a time without human contact.

summary_text: A story of friendship and loss of innocence when two worlds clash amid a wedding when a secret exposes a betrayal, and innocent friends converge with dangerous criminals and intense violence.

summary_text: In post-WWII America, a woman, rebuilding her life in the suburbs with her husband, kidnaps her neighbor and seeks vengeance for the heinous war crimes she believes he committed against her.

summary_text: 1809, France. Captain Neuville is called to the front, leaving his future bride heartbroken. Her sister decides to write letters on his behalf to cheer her up. But it all goes south when Neuville reappears.

name: Mine Games
summary_text: A group of young friends make an incomprehensible discovery in an abandoned mine, but the more they try to change the future, the more they seal their fate.

name: Funny Bones
summary_text: An unsuccessful comedian uncovers a family secret and learns the true price of letting inherent talent shine.

name: Two-Minute Warning
summary_text: A crazed sniper is set to kill spectators at an L.A. Coliseum football championship game and the police race against time to eliminate him.

name: Iliza: Elder Millennial
summary_text: Newly engaged comic Iliza Shlesinger dives into undeniable truths about life at age 35, the insanity of the road traveled and what's to come.

name: Margarita with a Straw
summary_text: A rebellious young woman with cerebral palsy leaves her home in India to study in New York, unexpectedly falls in love, and embarks on an exhilarating journey of self-discovery.

name: Bhooter Bhabishyat
summary_text: A rib-tickling comedy about a group of spirits who, in their various idiosyncrasies, try and save their only haunt, their resting place, when some unscrupulous builders try and break it down to build a modern monstrosity.

summary_text: A young lady from Georgia goes to Hollywood in the hopes of becoming an actress.

name: A Good Woman Is Hard to Find
summary_text: A recently widowed young mother will go to any lengths to protect her children as she seeks the truth behind her husband's murder.

name: Jackals
summary_text: Set in the 1980s, an estranged family hires a cult deprogrammer to take back their teenage son from a murderous cult, but find themselves under siege when the cultists surround their cabin, demanding the boy back.

name: Only the Animals
summary_text: A woman disappeared. After a snowstorm, her car is discovered on a road to a small remote village. While the police don't know where to start, five people are linked to the disappearance. Each one with his or her own secret.

name: Danika
summary_text: The story follows Danika, a woman whose fears for her children are manifested in premonitions of death and disaster. Bierko plays Tomei's husband, while Hall is her psychiatrist and confidant.

name: Sólo con tu pareja
summary_text: A womanizer is falsely diagnosed with AIDS by a jealous lover and falls in love with a woman equally suicidal as he.

name: Corbin Nash
summary_text: A rogue Police Detective in search of his parents' killer is murdered and then reborn as the ultimate killer.

name: Lucky

name: Lunacy
summary_text: A man takes up residence with a mysterious marquis and is soon persuaded to enter into an asylum for preventative therapy. Things are not what they seem, and the marquis may be even more sinister than what the young man may've predicted.

name: Cows

summary_text: Professor Quatermass, trying to gather support for his Lunar colonisation project, is intrigued by mysterious traces that have been showing up.

name: The Window
summary_text: To avoid the heat of a sweltering summer night a 9-year-old Manhattan boy decides to sleep on the fire escape and witnesses a murder, but no one will believe him.

name: The Public

name: The Red House
summary_text: An old man and his sister are concealing a terrible secret from their adopted teen daughter, concerning a hidden abandoned farmhouse, located deep in the woods.

name: The Lovers
summary_text: Debra Winger and Tracy Letts play a long-married, dispassionate couple who are both in the midst of serious affairs. But on the brink of calling it quits, a spark between them suddenly reignites, leading them into an impulsive romance.

summary_text: Everything changes for Eva when she receives a life insurance check accidentally made out for five million dollars instead of the expected fifty thousand dollars. She and her best friend take the money and head out for the adventure of a lifetime.

summary_text: During the 1920s France, con-men Philip and Felice escape prison and join forces to swindle Philip's rich ex-wife Belle.

name: Hold That Ghost
summary_text: After inheriting a fortune from a gangster, two dim-witted service station attendants find themselves stranded in a haunted house.

name: The Knock Out Cop
summary_text: Adventures of the police inspector "Flatfoot" Rizzo in the slums of Naples.

name: Head Count
summary_text: A group of college students on a weekend getaway accidentally summon a supernatural entity intent on using them for its deadly ritual.

name: Light It Up
summary_text: A group of teens are bent on improving the run-down conditions of their high-school.

name: Avenged
summary_text: A deaf girl is brutalized by a murderous gang who are then hunted by her when the bloodthirsty spirit of an Apache warrior inhabits her lifeless body.

name: Girl in Gold Boots
summary_text: A young woman leaves her job as a waitress and travels to Los Angeles, where she strives to become the top star in the glamorous world of go-go dancing.

summary_text: An escaped mental patient, two losers and a gay nurse go onto a roadtrip in order to find a secret gold treasure.

name: Trailer Park Boys
summary_text: Two petty felons have a documentary made about their life in a trailer park.

name: The 24th Day
summary_text: Tom (Speedman) and Dan's (Marsden) one-night stand turns into an intense power-play between captor and captive.

name: The Preppie Connection
summary_text: A student at a private school uses his connections to establish a drug trafficking network there.

name: Coco Chanel
summary_text: The life story of legendary fashion designer Coco Chanel.

name: Eureka
summary_text: The traumatized survivors of a murderous bus hijacking come together and take a road trip to attempt to overcome their damaged selves. Meanwhile a serial killer is on the loose.

summary_text: Abel Grey is sent to investigate the death of a boy from an exclusive local school, who is found floating in the river. Fearing scandal, the school insists it was suicide. But after ...                See full summary »

name: Trautmann
summary_text: The love story of a young English woman and a German PoW, who together overcome prejudice, public hostility and personal tragedy.

name: Magic Camp
summary_text: Andy, at the urging of his former mentor and Magic Camp owner Roy Preston, returns as a counselor to the camp of his youth hoping to reignite his career.

name: Night of the Living Dead 3D
summary_text: Both an homage to and a re-imagining of the original 1968 film, this update follows a group of survivors trapped in a farmhouse battling a siege of undead zombies....in 3D!

name: Priceless
